measurements_data.comments: Value includes household (20,818 tonnes/year), institutional (1,017 tonnes/year), and commercial (5,560 tonnes/year) waste disposed in Perserverance Landfill and all the waste in Dumfries Landfill (1,639 tonnes/year) totalling 29,034 tonnes/year. This value is then adjusted by the collection rate of 98.3 percent; CandD, shipping, industrial, and green waste excluded
